column2: "Na wɔbaa po no n'egya wɔ Gerasafo asaase do."

column2: "ɔno na ɔdze abodan mu ayɛ ne tsenabew; na obiara nntum mmfa nkɔnsɔnkɔnsɔn mpo nnkyekyer no bio

column7: na obiara nnyi ahoɔdzen dɛ ɔbɔdwedwe no."

column2: "Na ɔserɛɛ no pii dɛ mma ɔmmpam hɔn mmfi asaase no do."
"Nna mprekokuw kɛse bi wɔ kokwaa ne nkyɛn a woridzidzi."
"Na wɔserɛɛ no see dɛ
column3: Soma hɛn mpreko no mu

column2: "Na ɔmaa hɔn kwan. Na esunsum fi no fiir edzi kɛhɛɛn mpreko no mu
column3: na okuw no nyina faa twitwi kesiaan ɔbo kronn no koguguu po no mu
column5: na wɔtseetsee wui wɔ po no mu."

column2: "Na hɔn a wɔrenyɛn mpreko no guanee na wɔkɛkae wɔ kurow no mu na no nkwaado. Na wopuei bɔhwɛɛ adze kor a aba no."
"Na wɔbaa Jesus nkyɛn no
column3: wobohun nyia mbɔnsam faa no no dɛ ɔtse hɔ hyɛ atar
column5: mekyerɛ nyia a onyaa Legyin no a; na wosuroi."

column2: "Na hɔn a wohunii no kaa mbrɛ ɔyɛɛ nyia mbɔnsam faa no nye mpreko no ho asɛm kyerɛɛ hɔn."
"Na wɔhyɛɛ ase serɛɛ Jesus dɛ omfi hɔn apaamu hɔ nkɔ."
"Na ɔrokɔ hɛn no mu no
column3: nyimpa a nkan no mbɔnsam faa no no serɛɛ no dɛ ɔnye no bɛtsena."

column2: "Naaso Jesus amma no kwan
column3: na ɔsee no dɛ

column5: na mbrɛ oesi ehu wo mbɔbɔr no."

column2: "Na osii mu kɔree
column3: na ɔkɛhyɛɛ ase kaa ndzɛmba akɛse a Jesus yɛe maa no no wɔ Dekapolis

column2: "Na Jesus nam hɛn no mu twae baa esuegya bio no

column2: "Na nhyiamudan mu mpanyimfo no mu baako a ne dzin dze Jairus bae; na ohun no no

column2: "Na ntsɛmara no bɔgya bura wewee

column2: "Na ntsɛmara Jesus hun wɔ no mu dɛ ahoɔdzen a ɔwɔ no mu no bi efi mu no

column2: "Na ɔsee no dɛ

column4: wo gyedzi agye wo: kɔ asomdwee mu

column2: "Na Jesus da ho rekasa no

column2: "Ɔkɛhɛɛn hɔ no

column3: wɔsereew no twee. Na Jesus yii hɔn nyina edzi no

column2: "Na ntsɛmara na akataasia no soɛree na ɔnantsewee: (nna oedzi mfe duebien.) Na ntsɛmara hɔn ho boow hɔn kɛse."
